item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 5, 2025 at 1:15 PM UTC
item.description:

6. Guten: A Tiny Newspaper Printer (159 points | 67 comments)

21. Discuo – Anonymous discussions with infinite branching and 24h lifespan (19 points | 25 comments)
22. Counterculture legend who invented bell-bottom jeans dies at 84 (5 points | 1 comment)
23. The comb jelly can fuse with another (including nervous and digestive systems) (68 points | 11 comments)

25. 2024: A Record-Breaking Year for the Ocean Cleanup (3 points | discuss)

29. It Matters Who Owns Your Copylefted Copyrights (2021) (109 points | 152 comments)
